revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "Watering the . . . , 4 workers,;Embanking the water-channel of the 2-aroura plot . . . ,;Clearing away brushwood in the area devoted to kolophonion, 4 workers . . .,;To Satabous, donkey-driver, as wages for Phaophi and Hathyr . . . ,;Gathering sabautia in the area devoted to kolophonion in Hadrianos . . . ,;Watering the plot of twenty arouras, together with the . . . , 4 workers . . .,;Charge for transport on a donkey that brought up olive-oil . . . ,;Work performed by Satabous, teamster, on Hathyr 16 . . . ,;The ox-team worked 14 days . . . ,;and was used for transport 12 days . . . ,;and was idle 4 days . . .,;Total of ewxpenditures 198 dr.; reimbursement received 192 dr.;; remainder still owing 6 dr."

listBibl.bibl: Youtie HC, ZPE 31, 176-9, 1978, Pl Vc -- SB XIV 12203
